mapper.select: select u.user_num, u.nick, u.img , max_reg_date(c1.chg_id, u.user_num) as brd_reg_date from challenge c1 , challenger c2 , user1 u where c1.chg_id = #{chg_id} and c1.chg_id = c2.chg_id and c2.user_num = u.user_num order by brd_reg_date

select f1.user_num as my_user_num, f1.following_id , (select 1 from following f2 where f1.user_num = f2.following_id and f1.following_id = f2.user_num ) matpal , u.* from following f1, user1 u where f1.user_num = #{user_num} and f1.following_id = u.user_num
